li.span: of community service from the Class of 2019
named to the All-State Band, Choir or Orchestra

article.aria-label: Grading and reporting guidelines posted to Connect HPISD

img.alt: Grading and reporting guidelines posted to Connect HPISD Featured Photo

h3.a: Grading and reporting guidelines posted to Connect HPISD

div.div: A document has been created and posted to Connect HPISD to outline the grading and reporting guidelines for the spring 2020 during the emergency remote learning period.

article.aria-label: HPISD trustees approve credit/no credit model during emergency remote learning period

img.alt: HPISD trustees approve credit/no credit model during emergency remote learning period Featured Photo

h3.a: HPISD trustees approve credit/no credit model during emergency remote learning period

div.div: The Highland Park ISD Board of Trustees has approved a plan to offer credit/no credit to students during the emergency remote learning period caused by the coronavirus pandemic. The plan, which was an alternative to one initially presented, will allow high school students to receive numeric grades toward their GPA during this spring semester.

article.aria-label: HPISD schools to remain closed through 2019-20 school year

img.alt: HPISD schools to remain closed through 2019-20 school year Featured Photo

h3.a: HPISD schools to remain closed through 2019-20 school year

div.div: Texas Governor Greg Abbott announced today that schools throughout the state will remain closed for the rest of the 2019-20 school year.

article.aria-label: 3 students sign NCAA letters of intent

img.alt: 3 students sign NCAA letters of intent Featured Photo

h3.a: 3 students sign NCAA letters of intent

div.div: On Wednesday, April 15, three HPHS seniors signed letters of commitment to play collegiate sports as they continue to pursue their academics.

h2.a: Preparing students for college and career

div.div: On average, 97% of Highland Park High School graduates pursue a college degree. Some of the universities they attend are included below.
